trap.title: Would you be my
trap.subtitle: I have an important question for you...

timeline.title: Our Journey
timeline.subtitle: Scroll down to revisit our memories
timeline.tocome: And this isn't all, the best part is just beginning...

1.text: It all started with a desire to learn, to grow, to collaborate. Our chance encounter at the library was nothing short of miraculous â€” two souls drawn together by curiosity and fate. Something extraordinary sparked that day, and the connection between us has been writing our story from 2022 until today. ğŸ’«

2.text: From the very first conversation, I knew you were different. You â€” the brilliant analyst with the sharpest mind I've ever known. Me â€” the devoted programmer who speaks in code. Together we discovered that logic and love are the most beautiful algorithm. ğŸ’•

3.text: Every day with you brought something new â€” a lesson, a laugh, a quiet moment that meant the world. We understand each other on a level that goes beyond words. A programmer and an analyst, decoding life side by side. ğŸ¤

4.text: We explored new places, tried new things, and built memories that will last a lifetime. Every adventure is better because you're right next to me, sharing every smile and every sunset. ğŸŒ…

5.text: I write code, you analyze data â€” but our true language is love. We complete each other like the perfect function returns the perfect result. Our mutual understanding is our superpower. ğŸ’ªâ¤ï¸

6.text: It's not just the big moments. It's the morning coffees, the late-night talks, the quiet evenings when just being together is enough. These are the treasures I hold closest to my heart. â˜•ğŸŒ™

7.text: With every passing day, I fell more and more in love with you. Your strength, your kindness, your brilliant mind â€” everything about you makes my world brighter and more beautiful. ğŸŒŸ

8.text: We started dreaming together â€” about our future, our home, our life. Two ambitious souls, one shared vision. A programmer and an analyst building not just careers, but a life filled with love. ğŸ’­

9.text: My heart was racing, my hands were trembling, but my soul was certain. On February 21st, 2025, I asked you the most important question of my life. The emotions I felt in that moment â€” the joy, the nervousness, the overwhelming love â€” I will carry them forever. And when you said yes, the whole world stopped. That was the most magical day of my life. ğŸ¥¹ğŸ’âœ¨

10.text: The moment you said 'Yes' changed everything. Suddenly every dream felt real, every plan felt possible. I promised myself that day that I would spend every moment making you the happiest person in the world. And I intend to keep that promise, forever. ğŸ’–ğŸ¥‚

11.text: After the proposal, we dove into planning our future together. Every detail, every decision â€” made with so much love and excitement. The programmer in me wanted to organize everything perfectly, and the analyst in you made sure nothing was missed. The perfect team! ğŸ’‘

12.text: Happy Valentine's Day, my love! This year is so incredibly special â€” we're not just celebrating love, we're celebrating our journey to becoming husband and wife. You are my Valentine today and every day for the rest of my life. I love you beyond words. ğŸ’ğŸŒ¹

13.text: January 8th, 2026 â€” the day we made it official. The emotions at our civil ceremony were indescribable. Standing there, looking into your eyes, signing our names together â€” it was the most profound moment. We are officially partners in everything, and my heart has never been so full. ğŸ¥¹ğŸ’’

14.text: After the civil wedding, everything felt different â€” more real, more beautiful. Waking up next to you knowing we are officially building our life together is the greatest gift. Every morning since January 8th has been magical. ğŸŒ…ğŸ’‘

15.text: Our big day is coming â€” May 23rd, 2026! Our wedding will be one of the most important events of our lives. I can barely contain my excitement. Soon I'll watch you walk down the aisle, and I know that will be the moment I'll remember for the rest of my life. ğŸ‘°ğŸ¤µ

16.text: Wherever you are, that's where I feel at home. Your laughter is my favorite sound, your smile is my favorite view, and your arms are my favorite place. We've built something so beautiful together â€” not just a life, but a feeling of warmth and safety that I never want to lose. ğŸ’ğŸ”¥

17.text: I want to spend my entire life with you. Every morning, every evening, every ordinary Tuesday â€” I want them all with you. You are my person, my partner, my best friend, and the love of my life. This is my forever promise to you. ğŸ’ğŸ¤

18.text: Our story is just beginning, and I can't wait to write every chapter together. From the library where it all started, to the altar where we'll say 'I do' â€” every step of this journey has been magical because it's been with you. I love you, today and always. â™¾ï¸â¤ï¸

letter.title: A Message for You
letter.p1: I've been thinking about us a lot lately, and I just need you to know â€” meeting you was the greatest thing that ever happened to me. You walked into my life like a gentle storm and rearranged everything beautifully. ğŸŒ¹
letter.p2: You make even the most ordinary days feel extraordinary. A simple coffee with you is worth more than any adventure without you. Your warmth, your kindness, the way you look at me â€” it all makes my heart feel so full. â˜•ğŸ’•
letter.p3: I still get butterflies when I think about our wedding on May 23rd. The thought of standing opposite you, saying our vows, promising forever â€” it fills me with a kind of happiness I didn't even know existed. ğŸ‘°ğŸ¤µâœ¨
letter.p4: This Valentine's Day is different from all the others. We're not just two people in love â€” we're building a life together, step by step, day by day. And every single step with you feels like magic. ğŸ’
letter.p5: I want you to always remember this: no matter what life brings, I choose you. Today, tomorrow, and every day after that. You are my heart, my home, and my everything. ğŸ¤
letter.signature: Forever yours, with all my love â¤ï¸

end.title: Happy Valentine's Day!
end.subtitle: I hope you liked this little surprise.
